attributes.action: to link child support and visitation no pay no see!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my petition is simple why should absent parents get the same rights as resident parents when they dont pay or contribute towards their kids we want courts to link maintenence/commitment and visits because if the absent parent has to put little effort in why shouldn they gain when the resident parent doe's everything for the child and gets THE SAME rights

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
